description: This file provides persistence helpers for storing and retrieving the game's best score using SharedPreferences.

classes.name: Persistence
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to persist and access lightweight game state data such as the best score.

methods.name: Persistence.getBestScore
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves the stored best score, returning 0 if none is set.

methods.name: Persistence.setBestScore
methods.description: Asynchronously updates the stored best score if the provided score exceeds the current stored value.
